suggest.amasty/advanced-reviews-page-builder: Install advanced-reviews-page-builder module to activate PageBuilder and Advanced Review integration.
suggest.amasty/advanced-review-graphql: Install advanced-review-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Advanced Review integration.
suggest.amasty/advanced-review-mftf-3: Install advanced-review-mftf-3 module to implement module's mftf-tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
suggest.amasty/cron-schedule-list: Install module amasty/cron-schedule-list to see cron jobs in admin panel
